name: Pea Knight: Get A Potato
description:
On the eve of the shutdown of servers for Pea Knight, the MMO! you decide to try the game before it's gone. You receive the starting quest everybody receives:

Get a Potato.

But the map load to the area to farm potatoes is disabled! Luckily there's a player market and a nearby PVP zone.
---------------------
Pea Knight: Get A Potato is an exploratory prototype in working out what aspects of a top-down action game work best.

It's a short 10 minute experience with plans to iterate on the experience with further upgrade mechanics and enemy difficulty.

Any feedback welcome! 

---------------------

WASD - Move
Shift (Hold) - Aim Mode
Left Click - Sword Attack/Spell Cast when in Aim Mode
F - Interact
